Sentencas: The focus of this work is to construct a pseudo-operational Jacobi collocation scheme for numerically solving the Caputo variable-order time-fractional diffusion-type equations with applications in applied sciences.
Titulo: A robust scheme for Caputo variable-order time-fractional diffusion-type equations

Sentencas: Modeling scientific phenomena in the context of fluid flow problems, curing reactions of thermosetting systems, solid oxide fuel cells, and solvent diffusion into heavy oils led to the appearance of these equations.
Titulo: A robust scheme for Caputo variable-order time-fractional diffusion-type equations

Sentencas: For this reason, the numerical solution of these equations has attracted a lot of attention.
Titulo: A robust scheme for Caputo variable-order time-fractional diffusion-type equations

Sentencas: More precisely, using pseudo-operational matrices and appropriate approximations based on bivariate Jacobi polynomials, the approximate solutions of the variable-order time-fractional diffusion-type equations in the Caputo sense with high accuracy are formally retrieved.
Titulo: A robust scheme for Caputo variable-order time-fractional diffusion-type equations

Sentencas: Based on orthogonal bivariate Jacobi polynomials and their operational matrices, a sparse algebraic system is generated which makes implementing the proposed approach easy.
Titulo: A robust scheme for Caputo variable-order time-fractional diffusion-type equations

Sentencas: An error bound is computed for the residual function by proving some theorems.
Titulo: A robust scheme for Caputo variable-order time-fractional diffusion-type equations

Sentencas: To illustrate the accuracy and efficiency of the scheme, several illustrative examples are considered.
Titulo: A robust scheme for Caputo variable-order time-fractional diffusion-type equations

Sentencas: The results demonstrate the efficiency of the present method compared to those achieved by the Legendre and Lucas multi-wavelet methods and the Crank-Nicolson compact method.
Titulo: A robust scheme for Caputo variable-order time-fractional diffusion-type equations
